allow: Bash(cmd /c "IF EXIST artifacts\mandatory\render_sessions.log (TYPE artifacts\mandatory\render_sessions.log) ELSE (ECHO File not found)")

Bash(cmd /c "set IGL_D3D12_DEBUG=1 && set IGL_D3D12_GPU_VALIDATION=0 && set IGL_D3D12_DRED=0 && set IGL_DXGI_DEBUG=0 && set IGL_D3D12_CAPTURE_VALIDATION=0 && cd build\vs\samples\desktop\Debug && Tiny_MeshLarge.exe")
Bash(cmd /c "IF EXIST build\vs\samples\desktop\Debug\Tiny_MeshLarge.exe (echo Executable exists) ELSE (echo Executable NOT found)")
